a significant step back to superstardom: His first endorsement deal since his return to the NFL in 2009. The deal is with Unequal Technologies, a company that makes football pads Michael Vick used this season. Part of the reason I'm here is because I was able to wear some rib protection this season to guide me through my injury, said Michael Vick , who missed three games with a rib injury sustained Oct. 3.
